page.title: 07An Artist in Meltham
page.content: Trevor Stubley is a famous artist who lives near Meltham at Hart Holes studio near Holmfirth .He is a giant man with a long furry beard.He wears glasses when he is reading and painting.He mainly paints but he does some drawing and carving.He uses a volkswagen caravanette as a travelling studio which is a familiar sight around our area as he finds suitable views to do his landscape painting. As well as art he also likes classical music , especially that of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart and his favourite conductor is Andre Previn.
